data_table.description: The sample attributes data table includes FHS ESP HeartGO sample IDs, sample analyte type (DNA), body site (blood) where samples were collected, tumor status, ESP cohort, and ESP phenotypes.

variable.name: SAMPID
variable.description: Sample ID after adding "UW_" prefix to UW-sequenced samples

variable.name: ESP_phenotype
variable.description: ESP Phenotype group (phenotype that the sample was selected to be sequenced for)

variable.name: Body_site
variable.description: Body site or tissue that sample is from

variable.name: Is_tumor
variable.description: Indicator of whether sample from tumor
